Name: Backyard Brawl
About the game: Welcome to Backyard Brawl! A third person laser tag game. With a variety of weapons and gameplay, Backyard Brawl is the game you should play. Gamemodes Frenzy Go up against other players, all with one goal in mind. Eliminate all other opponents until I rein champion. Survive as long as possible, but if you die, you still keep all your eliminations and ammo. In this Gamemode, there are 4 weapons: Asault Rifle, found in the road behind the houses. Sniper, found in the top floor of the houses. SMG, found in the back of the houses. Shotgun, found in the front of the houses. Controls Move = WASD Sprint = Shift (cannot sprint while reloading or sprinting) Reload = R (cannot reload while sprinting) Pickup = E Shoot = Left Click (Cannot shoot while sprinting) Aim = Right Click (Cannot aim while sprinting)
